column4: How i can enable my second Xeon 550 Processor in 6.06 ?, I think i need a SMP kernel ? kindly Help me
you need a smp kernel, you may have to compile your own, or upgrade to 8.10 which has a smp kernel standard
: 6.06 donot support SMP on i368 system ?
yes it does but I don't know if Ubuntu still do a pre rolled smp kernel
